mapper.insert: insert into app_user (id, name, age, qq, email, address, user_code, sex, password, IDcard, phone_number) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update app_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, age, qq, email, address, user_code, sex, password, IDcard, phone_number from app_user
SELECT id, name, age, qq, email, address, user_code, sex, password, IDcard, phone_number from app_user where phone_number = #{phoneNumber}
SELECT id, name, age, qq, email, address, user_code, sex, password, IDcard, phone_number from app_user where phone_number = #{0} and email = #{1}
